text: Alberto Bernardo de Azevedo Leite Rodrigues (born 15 September 1945) is a Portuguese equestrian. He competed in two events at the 1992 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1945 births Category:Living people Category:Portuguese male equestrians Category:Olympic equestrians of Portugal Category:Equestrians at the 1992 Summer Olympics Category:People from Aveiro, Portugal
title: Alberto Rodrigues (equestrian)
